Text: Fwd Hey KimContentTransferEncoding bit Returnpath From Fullname Donwaller MessageID Date Tue Dec EST Subject Hey Kim To MIMEVersion ContentType textplain charsetUSASCII XMailer CompuServe bit sub Hey Kim Hope all is well You have been on my mind a lot so I thought I would try to get in touch with you I am now back at home after taking a severance package with Kraft Sept we had a new addition to the familyDonwho is so sweet and big Are you going to Memphis over the holidays I would love to get together Take care and let me hear from you Much love Yonnie

Hey KimHeyI am sadwe will not come home until Christmas Day Will you back after that I would love to spend some time with you How is Houston I know you liked it there before but had grown to love the west Are you looking anywhere special for a joblike Memphis Have you heard from any one who worked in the World Trade Center Of course I thought immediately of visiting your workplace there It was unbelievably horrible Talk to you soonI am so glad we are emailing Love ya Yonnie
